question: [File: aptos-core/config/src/config/override_node_config.rs] [Function: load_config()] [Deserialization Gadget] Can serde_yaml deserialization gadgets be chained to achieve code execution when processing specially crafted configuration files? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/config/src/config/override_node_config.rs] [Function: override_config_mut()] [Governance Bypass] Can governance-related configurations (proposal thresholds, voting periods) be overridden to enable hostile takeovers or bypass governance security? (Critical)
